definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: come to an end, cease (Targum, [[סוּף]] Syr. (swp) sop , cease, stop (oft.), Targum [[סוֹפָא]], Syr. suwpo0, NH [[סוֹף]] end); —

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 pl. [[סָָפוּ]] Ps 73:19, [[וְסָêפוּ]] consec. Am 3:15; Impf. 3 ms. [[יֶסוּף]] Es 9:28; 3 mpl. [[יׇסֻ֫פוּ]] Is 66:17; —come to an end Am 3:15, Is 66:17, Ps 73:19 (+ [[תַּמּוּ]]), [[וְזִכְרָם לאׁ־יׇסוּף]] [[מִזַּרְעָם]] Es 9:28.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: make an end of, only (if text correct) Impf. 1 s. (+Inf. abs. [[אָסׂף]], chosen for assonance, v. [[אסף]]), cohort. = juss. In form, [[אָסׂף אָסֵף]] Zep 1:2, [[אָסֵף]] v:Zep 1:3, v:Zep 1:3, [[אָסׂף אֲסִיפֵם]] Je 8:13 (on these forms v. Gf Bö:§ 988, 1 Kö:i.445, 466); but rd. perhaps, for [[אָסֵף]], [[אֶאֱסׂף]], We Buhl:Lex 13, or [[אׂסֵף]], Ges:§§ 72 aa, 113 w n.3 Now:Zep 1:2, and in Je [[אָסׂף אׂסְפֵם]] Ges:l.c. (against Gie v. Hi).
